title: Implement mute all in champ select, ingame and post game in default settings mode.
body: I'm tired of how post game people just make fun of me consistently post game when I feed. I want to mute everyone so I can focus on myself, my own gameplay. Can you not implement this? Please Do not see this as a whining post, if you were in my shoes, and you consistently feed because of your aggressive playstyle, just give me the ability to not be able to hear this stuff always. Just once in a while, of course I can understand taking words when I make mistakes but I do not want to get verbally shitted on every 9 out of 10 games. It makes me angry and not want to play. Might as well quit! Do you want me to quit?

replies.body: What do you mean by "in default settings mode"? Do you mean that the default behavior when someone installs LoL and logs in should be to not have any chat, until the player goes into settings and changes something? Or do you mean that you want a new, _persistent_ "mute all" feature that you can turn on once rather than manually muting in every game?

i think he meant that he has the option to have it automatic if needed rather than have to mute all every single game
You could move to China since they likely won't have chat soon.
I'm not stopping you from turning off all chat and muting everyone on your team.

That doesn't stop people from flaming in post-game chat, it used to be if you muted someone you would not see their post-game chat but then Riot did something fucking stupid and undid that change. You could argue that you could just hit play again or exit quickly but sometimes you want to see stats without feeling the heat of your team or the enemy team.
Get some tough skin or leave the lobby.
